mention.text: fire , explosion at ammunition depot in Trans-Baikal
those who were injured during the first explosions when the shockwave smashed windows in houses
Russian Defense Ministry spokesman Major-General Igor Konashenkov
his deputy Dmitry Bulgakov to the Trans-Baikal Territory
